analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders an SVG “delete” (trash bin) icon with a configurable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable delete icon in the project’s UI, especially in navigation or action buttons.

Components.name: IconDelete
responsibilities: Expose a `fill` prop to control SVG path color
Render the delete/trash bin shape as inline SVG

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Declares component props in the `<script setup>` block.

fill.description: Color used to fill the SVG path

analysis.Usage: Import with `import IconDelete from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconDelete.vue'` and use in templates as `<IconDelete />` or `<IconDelete fill="#ff0000" />`.
Notes: No separate `<style>` block—styles are driven by SVG attributes and CSS variables.
All SVG markup is inline, so no external asset loading is needed.
The component is lean and has no reactive state or lifecycle hooks.
